mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_b.cart ( productId, number, createTime, userId ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{number}, now(), #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE db_b.cart SET productId = #{productId}, number = #{number}, createTime = #{createTime}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, userId = #{userId} WHERE cart.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_b.cart ORDER BY id
select sum(number) from db_b.cart where userId = #{userId} group by userId
